messages.subject: Re: skylark
messages.msgSnippet: ... Dear Ann -- Thank you for your kind words. I promise, really I promise, that the book will be gentle.  I m a Friend (Quaker) -- we try to work hard at it
messages.messageBody:
ann leadbetter wrote:

> From: ann leadbetter <aleadbet@...>
>
> > Thanks very much indeed. The publisher says it will be off the
> press on
> > the 30th. Folks can read a sample chapter and the foreword by
> Joseph
> > Chilton Pearce at my website http://www.skylarksings.com
>
> Oh that's why I haven't gotten it yet. I ordered it three weeks ago
> from
> Holt and Assoc. ONe for me and, on faith, one for my very
> antihomeschooling mother-in-law. From the annotation in the HOlt
> catelogue
> it sounded like the kind of gently persuasive book she would enjoy
> reading
> and find herself agreeing with in spite of herself. I'm just so tired
> of
> arguing with someone who is uninformed. I was surprised she agreed to
> read
> something about homeschooling b/c she is so absolutely certain that we
> are
> ruining our children's lives and that schools are the one and only
> way.
> So, Iguess I'm putting a lot of stock in your book as the first book
> she's
> ever read on the subject! If she's willing after reading your book,
> I'll
> send her some of Holt's.
>
> I've loved everything you've said so far in this chat group and I'm
> looking forward to your book.
>
> Ann >

Dear Ann --

Thank you for your kind words. I promise, really I promise, that the
book will be gentle. I'm a Friend (Quaker) -- we try to work hard at it
(even though sometimes we fail.) I wrote the book thinking of elderly
aunt who wants to know what I think I am doing with her darling nieces
(and would report me to whomever if they weren't thriving so well!)
Seriously, I've given a lot of thought to making the book accessible to
doubters.

David

--
My book "And the Skylark Sings with Me: Adventures in Homeschooling and
Community-Based Education" will be off the press around September 30.
To read a sample chapter, reviewers' comments, or the foreword, visit my
website at http://www.skylarksings.com

Chilton Pearce at my website http://www.skylarksings.com

> :-) BTW, if any of you would like to encourage and/or support my

will do,

David

messages.messageBody:
david, i ordered your book yesterday through my local bookstore.
i had them look it up in thier catalog of new books, the ladie called in
and asked for it .....
anyway just wanted to let you know. we all need encouragement and
support in our endevours.
:-) BTW, if any of you would like to encourage and/or support my
endevour please visit:
http://sites.netscape.net/honeysoap/homepage
Deborah ^G^
